001package net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns;
002
003import java.lang.annotation.*;
004
005/**
006 * Marks a class or interface as part of the Strategy Pattern.
007 * <p>
008 * Typically applied to:
009 * - The Strategy interface (defines the contract)
010 * - Concrete Strategy implementations (different algorithms)
011 */
012@Documented
013@DesignPattern(DesignPattern.Category.BEHAVIORAL)
014@Retention(RetentionPolicy.SOURCE)
015@Target(ElementType.TYPE)
016public @interface Strategy {
017
018    /**
019     * Represents the role of a class or interface within the Strategy design pattern.
020     *
021     * <p>The Strategy pattern defines a family of algorithms, encapsulates each one,
022     * and makes them interchangeable. Roles help clarify whether a type is the
023     * abstract strategy interface or a concrete implementation of an algorithm.
024     */
025    enum Role {
026        /**
027         * Represents the abstract strategy interface in the pattern.
028         */
029        INTERFACE,
030        /**
031         * Represents a concrete implementation of the strategy.
032         */
033        CONCRETE
034    }
035
036    Role value();
037}
